def run(inputs, license_key):
    # 1. Extract product ID from URL
    product_id = extract_product_id(inputs['productUrl'])
    
    # 2. Fetch reviews via StackMatrices proxy
    reviews = sm.fetch_data(
        license_key=license_key,
        source="reviews",
        product_id=product_id,
        limit=inputs['reviewCount']
    )
    
    # 3. AI analysis via StackMatrices proxy
    analysis = sm.ai_analyze(
        license_key=license_key,
        data=reviews,
        analysis_type=inputs['analysisType']
    )
    
    return analysis
